CustomField.formula: IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "MPW",'Please provide the number of push to talk and push to video users.',"This Tab allows you to configure the Line Termination boards according to the inputs selected in the ONT Tab. Only LTs related to the ONTs technology selected will be shown -GPON, XGSPON or both.")
CustomField.label: Guidance
